weather.title: Ivory Coast has a tropical climate with high temperatures and humidity year-round. It experiences a wet season from April to October, characterized by heavy rainfall, while the dry season from November to March offers drier conditions

when_to_visit.title: Dry season
when_to_visit.short_description: Less rainfall and more sunshine, making it ideal for outdoor activities and sightseeing. Temperatures in interior regions will be slightly higher

when_to_visit.title: Wet season
when_to_visit.short_description: High rainfall and humidity. Travel is still possible but expect frequent rain showers and potential for tropical storms

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Ivory Coast is during the dry season from November to March when you can enjoy warm temperatures, lower chances of rainfall, and ideal conditions for exploring the country's beautiful beaches, national parks, and cultural sites
